Yep, this week is devoted to generators.

Comments, complaints, or questions are welcome.

I'll start with one complaint: they're inconsisent.

I have a scenario with a generator on the player's team that will keep 
going and going and going and going, and the characters created by the 
generator aren't of the same level number as the generator.

Yet, in other scenarios, they shut down after a while, even if the 
number of characters never exceeds 100.
